about_the_game:
EXPERIENCE INTRIGUE AND STRATEGY
- Play as a Spacecrew: Achieve victory by completing all tasks or smartly identifying and voting out the impostors.
- Play as an Impostor: Execute covert eliminations and deploy strategic sabotages to create discord among the Spacecrew.
- Play as a Neutral: Each neutral role comes with unique objectives. Excel in these roles to claim your victory.
- Teamwork is Key: Work closely with teammates to complete critical tasks and ensure the safety of your spaceship. Will you maintain trust, or will betrayal lead to chaos?

PARTY FOR FUN
- Duo and Squad Modes: Perfect for playing alongside friends and family. Team up, strategize, deduce, and enjoy the game together.
- Private Rooms with Custom Rules: Take control by setting your own game rules and inviting friends and family to join.

DIVERSE MODES:
- Colosseum: Fight to be the last one standing in this ultimate survival challenge.
- Hide & Seek: Complete tasks and dodge the hunters in this thrilling evasion showdown.
- Lover Mode：Stay alive with your lover and navigate challenges together to secure victory.
- More: More modes are waiting for you to explore.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR GAMEPLAY:
- Upgrade Your Role: Enhance your roles with exclusive Emotes, Action Effects, Fashion outfits, and more. Stand out with your unique style!

Ready for a journey filled with trust, deception, and tactical gameplay? Download Super Sus now and step into the vastness of space where every match is a new mystery!
detailed_description:
EXPERIENCE INTRIGUE AND STRATEGY
- Play as a Spacecrew: Achieve victory by completing all tasks or smartly identifying and voting out the impostors.
- Play as an Impostor: Execute covert eliminations and deploy strategic sabotages to create discord among the Spacecrew.
- Play as a Neutral: Each neutral role comes with unique objectives. Excel in these roles to claim your victory.
- Teamwork is Key: Work closely with teammates to complete critical tasks and ensure the safety of your spaceship. Will you maintain trust, or will betrayal lead to chaos?

PARTY FOR FUN
- Duo and Squad Modes: Perfect for playing alongside friends and family. Team up, strategize, deduce, and enjoy the game together.
- Private Rooms with Custom Rules: Take control by setting your own game rules and inviting friends and family to join.

DIVERSE MODES:
- Colosseum: Fight to be the last one standing in this ultimate survival challenge.
- Hide & Seek: Complete tasks and dodge the hunters in this thrilling evasion showdown.
- Lover Mode：Stay alive with your lover and navigate challenges together to secure victory.
- More: More modes are waiting for you to explore.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR GAMEPLAY:
- Upgrade Your Role: Enhance your roles with exclusive Emotes, Action Effects, Fashion outfits, and more. Stand out with your unique style!

Ready for a journey filled with trust, deception, and tactical gameplay? Download Super Sus now and step into the vastness of space where every match is a new mystery!

name: Super Sus

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit (latest Service Pack)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8650
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 600 series, AMD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 32-bit operating systems are not supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit (latest Service Pack)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 or AMD Ryzen™ 5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060/ GeForce® GTX 1650 or AMD R9 380/AMD RX 6400 or Intel® Arc™ A770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 32-bit operating systems are not supported

short_description: Welcome to join the multiplayer social deduction game - Super Sus! Engage in intense gameplay with global players, as you strategize to safeguard your spaceship from the cunning Impostors determined to sabotage the mission and eliminate everyone aboard!
supported_languages:
English*, Russian, Indonesian, Japanese, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese, Arabic
*languages with full audio support
